title: Downgrade warnings in It_publishes_projects_targeting_netcoreapp11_with_p2p_targeting_netcoreapp11 test execution
body:
```
D:\Src\sdk\.dotnet_cli\sdk\1.0.0-rc4-004840\NuGet.targets(97,5): warning : Detected package downgrade: Microsoft.NETCore.App from 1.1.1 to 1.1.0  [D:\Src\sdk\bin\Debug\Tests\It_publishes_projects_targeting_netcoreapp11_with_p2p_targeting_netcoreapp11\NetCoreApp11WithP2P\App\App.csproj] [D:\Src\sdk\build\build.proj]
D:\Src\sdk\.dotnet_cli\sdk\1.0.0-rc4-004840\NuGet.targets(97,5): warning : App (>= 1.0.0) -> Library (>= 1.0.0) -> Microsoft.NETCore.App (>= 1.1.1)  [D:\Src\sdk\bin\Debug\Tests\It_publishes_projects_targeting_netcoreapp11_with_p2p_targeting_netcoreapp11\NetCoreApp11WithP2P\App\App.csproj] [D:\Src\sdk\build\build.proj]
D:\Src\sdk\.dotnet_cli\sdk\1.0.0-rc4-004840\NuGet.targets(97,5): warning : App (>= 1.0.0) -> Microsoft.NETCore.App (>= 1.1.0) [D:\Src\sdk\bin\Debug\Tests\It_publishes_projects_targeting_netcoreapp11_with_p2p_targeting_netcoreapp11\NetCoreApp11WithP2P\App\App.csproj] [D:\Src\sdk\build\build.proj]
```

I intend to clean up how test std output is handled so that it doesn't cause a warning in the build. But is the test expecting this downgrade?

@dsplaisted
